title: James Horner - Braveheart [Remastered Limited Edition] (2015)
description:
James Horner - Braveheart [Remastered Limited Edition] (2015)

Artist: James Horner
Title Of Album: Braveheart
Year Of Release: 2015
Label (Catalog#): La-La Land Records [LLLCD 1375]
Country: United States
Genre: Soundtrack
Quality: FLAC
Bitrate: Lossless
Time: 2:09:04

La-La Land Records, Icon Productions, Paramount Pictures and Universal Music Special Markets proudly celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the 1995 historical epic BRAVEHEART with an expanded and remastered 2-CD limited edition release of renowned composer James Horner's original motion picture score. This limited edition release is dedicated to James Horner's memory.
